column2: My guardian cares a lot about being "civilized". From table manners to favoured reading, everything is to be civilized.
I will be civilized from now on!
My ward is acting as a proper young [From.GetManWoman]. [From.GetSheHe] will be a decent person whe [From.GetSheHe] grows up a little more.
This casus belli allows a ruler who is aspiring to rebuild Jestian Hegemonia subjugate a lower-tier ruler in Hestian lands.
